mapper.select: select tpsr.prob_no, tpsr.prob_seq_no, tti.topic_nm, tti.chapter_nm, tti.section_nm, tti.subsection_nm, tpsr.correct from ai_model_showcase.tb_member_info tmi left join ai_model_showcase.tb_prob_solve_result tpsr on tmi.member_no = tpsr.member_no left join ai_model_showcase.tb_topic_info tti on tpsr.q_idx = tti.q_idx where tmi.member_no = '210701427';
